pr_title: SE-9718 Adds a cache for resolving blobs by path

timeline.message:
Adds a cache for resolving blobs by path

Because S2 needs to resolve files for public viewing using the path,
this leads to a lot of database lookups. To counter this we now employ
a cache.

Fixes: SE-9718

Moves the deletes into the abstract class

This allows the cache handling to happen in one place.

Fixes: SE-9718

Also clear the path cache when updating a blob

This might update the filename. Thus we need to clear the cache.

Fixes: SE-9718
